        Find elements having attribute with given value. Seems to work incorrectly if attribute name contains dash, for example:
        Parameters:
        attributeName - name of attribute, should not be empty or null
        attributeValue - value of attribute, should not contain both apostrophes and quotes

        standard selenium By criteria

      • by

        Synonym for #byAttribute Seems to work incorrectly in HtmlUnit and PhantomJS if attribute name contains dash (e.g. "data-mailServerId")
